content:
this is a single endpoint from an open api spec document
it has been minified by removing unnecessary kvps
additionally common terms have been abbreviated  operationId: GetTrafficV2 path: https://gateway.stackpath.com/waf/v2/stacks/{stack_id}/traffic content: params
name stackid
desc a stack id or slug
in path
required true
schema
type str
name siteid
desc a site id
in query
required false
schema
type str
name startdate
desc a lower bound date to search traffic for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name enddate
desc an upper bound date to search traffic for
in query
required false
schema
type str
format datetime
name resolution
in query
required false
desc daily all data points represent one day of traffic
  hourly all data points represent one hour of traffic
  minutely all data points represent one minute of traffic
schema
type str
default daily
sum get traffic
desc retreive a report of a stack or sites waf traffic
responses
200
wafgettrafficv2response
type obj
traffic
type arr
waftrafficv2
type obj
props
timestamp
type str
format datetime
desc the date and time traffic metrics were recorded for
api
type str
desc the number of requests to urls designated as api urls
ajax
type str
desc the number of ajax requests
static
type str
desc the number of requests to static assets
customblocked
type str
desc the number of requests blocked by custom rules
policyblocked
type str
desc the number of requests blocked by policies
ddosblocked
type str
desc the number of requests blocked by layer 7 ddos protection
monitored
type str
desc the number of monitored requests
customwhitelisted
type str
desc the number of requests allowed by custom rules
policywhitelisted
type str
desc the number of requests from allowed search engines and other allowed bots
originerror4xx
type str
desc the number of http 4xx errors received from the origin
originerror5xx
type str
desc the number of http 5xx errors received from the origin
origintimeout
type str
desc the number of request timeouts from the waf to the origin
uncategorized
type str
desc the number of uncategorized requests
passedtoorigin
type str
desc the number of requests that were passed to the origin
responsetime
type str
desc the average response time to the origin in milliseconds
total
type str
desc the total number of requests for the given time period
desc a set of individual timeseries waf traffic metrics
desc the requested waf traffic
desc a response from a request to retrieve a stacks waf traffic
title: 30_Traffic_GetTrafficV2_172.json
